mapper.select: SELECT notice.id , notice.deleted , notice.created_at as createdAt , notice.modified_at as modifiedAt , notice.title , notice.content , notice.img FROM notice WHERE notice.id = #{id}

SELECT notice.id FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= notice.created_at AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT notice.id FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= notice.created_at AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY notice.created_at ORDER BY notice.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(notice.id) as listsize FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= notice.created_at AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT notice.id FROM notice WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= notice.created_at AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND #{createdAt} > notice.created_at ORDER BY notice.created_at DESC
AND notice.created_at > #{createdAt} ORDER BY notice.created_at ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
